Workflow Description: Successful login issues JWT and routes user to dashboard
Notes: Redirect handled with react-router; AuthManager syncs token to context

Workflow Description: Invalid credentials display authentication failure message
Notes: Add Playwright assertion for error banner

Workflow Description: Centralized AuthManager keeps API client token aligned with AuthContext state
Tutor can view paginated list of own timesheets from dashboard
Notes: Client-side filters complement server query params

Workflow Description: Tutor submits draft timesheet for lecturer review
Notes: Bulk submit UI present; backend batching still pending

Workflow Description: Tutor edits rejected timesheet to return to draft status
Notes: Ensure validation errors surface through shared error banners

Workflow Description: Tutor dashboard summary shows personal hours, pay, and pending metrics
Notes: Add Playwright assertion for summary widgets

Workflow Description: Lecturer views pending timesheets requiring review
Notes: Filters combine urgent toggle, course select, and search

Workflow Description: Lecturer approves pending timesheet transitioning it forward
Notes: Batch approval shares same service path

Workflow Description: Quote endpoint returns EA-compliant associated hours, payable hours, and amount
Notes: Backend owns financial calculations; frontend treats result as read-only

Workflow Description: Timesheet create/update ignores client financial fields and persists Schedule 1 calculation
Notes: TimesheetApplicationService applies Schedule1Calculator output on every mutation

Workflow Description: Schedule 1 policy tables seeded with University of Sydney EA 2023-2026 rates
Notes: Ensure migrations execute in all environments; seeding is prerequisite for calculator accuracy

Workflow Description: Timesheet form surfaces rate code and formula to provide transparency
Notes: UI displays backend metadata (rateCode, formula) for compliance audits

Workflow Description: Lecturer rejects timesheet with comment for tutor follow-up
Notes: Add Playwright coverage for rejection modal interaction

Workflow Description: Lecturer dashboard summary highlights course metrics and urgent count
Notes: Ensure summary matches mock metrics in tests

Workflow Description: Admin dashboard shows system-wide totals and KPIs
Notes: Analytics tab currently placeholder; hide or annotate before launch

Workflow Description: Admin performs final approval on lecturer-confirmed timesheets
Notes: Bulk admin approval not yet implemented

Workflow Description: Admin rejects lecturer-confirmed timesheet with justification
Notes: Plan Playwright test to assert focus trap and error states

Workflow Description: Backend recalculates all financial fields using Schedule 1 policy data
